title: Live In A Community With A Lot Of Perks! Affordable 3 Bedroom Apt Home
posting_body: ['Make Cedar Ridge Apartments your home today!', 'Our one, two and three bedroom apartment homes offer a large comfortable living room, spacious bedrooms, personal walk out patios, beautiful views, and ample kitchen counter top space that is perfect for entertaining guests.', 'Call today for a tour of Cedar Ridge to see everything we have to offer!', 'Community Amenities Include:', '- In-Home Air-Conditioning System', '- Ample Kitchen Counter-Top & Cabinet Space', '- Master Suite Walk-In Closet (In select homes)', '- Personal Walk-Out Patio Or Balcony', '- Ample Off-Street Open Parking', '- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Service', '- Nearby Soccer Field, Volleyball & Tennis Courts', 'We are a pet friendly community!', 'Dogs & cats welcome!', '*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.', 'Cedar Ridge participates in an affordable housing program.', 'Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $49,320 | 2', 'Occupants: $56,340 | 3', 'Occupants: $63,360 | 4 Occupants: $70,380 | 5 Occupants: $76,020 | 6', 'Occupants: $81,660.', 'To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Tuesday: 9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Wednesday: 11:00AM-7:00PM', 'Thursday-Friday: 9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Call today to learn more about our community:', 'show contact info', 'Cedar Ridge', '1401 Namekagon Avenue', 'Hudson, WI, 54016', '<URL>', '*Some Restrictions May Apply.', 'zVLkaF1a08n']
